Magic

Magic is a phenomenon in some creations allowing for the manipulation of the world by a trinity inhabbiting it, usually taking one of two forms: divine, and arcane.

Divine

Divine magic is the application of mana under the dominion of a divine atman to some effect usually appealed for by a mortal atman engaged in a trinity. Unlike arcane magic, divine magic requires that the divine atman in question still be existant.

True divine magic is near-impossible in the Creation Marlien, where the creator divine atman are no longer existant.

Arcane

Arcane magic is the act of an atman, usually mortal, manipulating larger quantities of mana by means of mechanics permitted by the Creation. This usually involves the expenditure of some small quantity of mana-imbued anicca as a catalyst to draw upon the mana reserves of the Creation or The Great Beyond, and then the performance of some ritual to control it.

Faux Divine

Some mortal entities within a Creation serve as subjects of whorship to others, and some such deities choose to answer appeals from these others with extensions of their own will, by arcane manipulation of mana, which may appear miraculous or divine to their whorshippers.

Magical and Non-magical Creations

Creations in which arcane magic is impossible, heavily restricted, deeply integrated with the physics of the Creation, kept secret from any inhabitants, or is otherwise sufficiently rare, are refered to as non-magical creations, while those where magic is widely practiced are refered to as magical creations.
